author: ShawnMarie
title: Adorable Bat, challenging build
review:
I found this set buried at a Barnes & Noble and fell in love with the bat immediately.  The vampire? Eh, not so much. I love anything Halloween so I had to have this.  Despite the fact that it only has 150 pieces it took me nearly 2 hours to build. The vampire was fascinating to put together, great use of "normal" pieces.  I had to rebuild his head twice though as the directions weren't quite clear enough for me. (!)

Love the colors - lavender and purple with black.

And the bat?  Yeah, he's awesome!
